question: You need a lift. Let's go to Arcade and celebrate... your alert successor...Logan-6.
answer: Has anyone ever broken in to where the babies are?

question: Not in my time...
answer: just wondered...what happens? but you don't know, you Just say what everyone says. One for one. One for one."

question: I guess you never had her? You missed something special.
answer: Well...you can't have them all.

question: The damned Yellows are getting out of hand. Those three ought to be in Cathedral. No business scrambling in Arcade...
answer: You should have been with us in Nursery, Daniel. I'm positive I recognized him -

question: Damn! That's right. Just when I feel like an ALL OUT BLAST in Arcade .
answer: Want me to take your shift? I'm feeling restless anyway Now there's a few who could have been his seed-mother.

question: Only a few? You're just not trying.
answer: Looks like I'm working. Who invited you?

question: I'm in my party mood.
answer: Runner terminated 0:31 Ready for cleanup. That was a great shot you made.

question: Yes. But you look a little rusty to me -- what were you doing, wondering? ...Well I think you're getting stale. You need old Lucey--Go on. Gee the whole burn--try the new psycho-lift-they tell me it turns you inside out... I'll look for you here when I'm off--
answer: What's wrong, Available?

question: What's wrong, Available?
answer: Please . . .No.

question: Please . . . no ? You mean "not here"--that's it? You're a private Available but particular, Don't worry. There's no one here but me. And you.
answer: No. Just no.

question: You prefer women?
answer: No.

question: Well then...?
answer: Nothing. I felt sad, I put myself on the circuit. It was a mistake.

question: Sad? What made you sad?
answer: A friend of mine went on Carousel tonight. Now he's gone.

question: Yes...probably he was renewed?
answer: He was killed

question: Killed? Why do you use that word?
answer: Isn't it right? Isn't that what you do? Kill.

question: I never 'killed' anybody in my life. Sandmen terminate Runners Who brought you?
answer: Nobody. I felt sad. .. I put myself on the circuit.

question: You felt sad. What's your name?
answer: Jessica.

question: You're beautiful. Let's have sex.
answer: No.

question: Later.
answer: No.

question: But you put yourself on the circuit!
answer: I thought I had to do something.

question: And?
answer: I changed my mind

question: And now?
answer: Curious.

question: About what?
answer: How a Sandman lives.

question: Let's have sex. I thought you were curious.
answer: Not about that.

question: I'm listening.
answer: I'm afraid to tell you.

question: I'm not armed. Well?
answer: Why is it wrong to run?

question: You shouldn't even think such things... And you picked a strange person to say them to -
answer: I suppose. But what if you want to live?

question: So? Do what everyone does. Try like hell for renewal. When this turns black...that's it. If for any reason you want to be 31... you have the same chance as everyone else...Carrousel.
answer: Six. I go red next year.

question: You're years away . . . I don't know why you're thinking of these things, much less talking about them. Want to try? What Quad do you live in? It's nice to know you can nod. It's nice co know you can do that, too.
answer: These are for me -- you've got your own. She must have been something--?

question: What happened to you? How come?
answer: CUBS!

question: Get yourself a new face while you're at it They know you now. I just might look in on New You 483 myself.
answer: You? Why? You're already beautiful.

question: No -- it's that last Runner -- someone in 483 was trying to help him.
answer: See you in the hydrotoner!

question: Negative. Question Negative. I don't understand? Question: 1056 unaccounted for?! Impossible! Question Question But everyone believes that some.... Question I will. Question Question My Lifeclock... Question Question
answer: What the hell took you so long?

question: Did you ever see anybody renew?
answer: I think you've been skulling out too much. First Nursery and now stupid questions.

question: Did you?
answer: Of course.

question: Anybody we know?
answer: Look....why don't you get into the water....you need it....more than I do.

question: I'm fine.... See you....
answer: At Carousel tonight?

question: Location...female Green Six... name Jessica...living in Quad K. She has.
answer: You could have called me yourself.

question: But I wasn't sure you'd come.
answer: Here I am. Shall I come in?

question: I couldn't get you out of my mind.
answer: I'm the most beautiful woman you've ever seen, I suppose?

question: Maybe...sure....
answer: Thanks...but I have the choice.

question: Of course.
answer: Then it's still no. You can have any woman in the city. What do you really want?

question: You know
answer: I don't believe you. There has to be more.

question: All right.
answer: Why show me?

question: I'm going to run. You know something.
answer: About running, dying what?

question: Both...running's what I'm interested in.
answer: I know what everyone knows. Try like hell for Renewal. You have the same chance everyone else has.

question: It's different now. Help me.
answer: How can I? Where did you get that?

question: A Runner gave it to me.
answer: And then you killed him, right?

question: I let him go...believe me.
answer: I don't.. Please? What friends?

question: I don't have much time.
answer: I never heard of a Sandman running . . . ever. . .

question: Are you here to help me?
answer: What do you need? What're you going to do?

question: That's tomorrow.
answer: I wish I could help you.

question: Maybe you'll chink of something...
answer: I wish I knew what you think I know.

question: If you did know, you'd tell me.
answer: Of course--

question: Tell me, Jessica. A Runner...Cathedral. A woman.
answer: You're not going, are you?

question: Have you ever been through Cathedral? They're like beasts. Wild.
answer: Maybe they're angry because they're grown in meccano-breeders. Some people say children need human mothering.

question: Insane. Nurseries are better than any mother could be.
answer: I'm only telling you what I've heard... Haven't you ever wondered what your seed-mother was Like...?

question: Uh-uh.
answer: I have.

question: When did you begin to question Lastday?
answer: I don't remember exactly...except I was a Green. What would you like to relive, Logan?

question: I've never been in this quadrant. Is that Arcade off there?
answer: Let me go first. Sometimes they're waiting just inside there--to rush you when it opens... Quickly now--

question: Muscle? I don't know that one.
answer: It's unauthorized. No good for any- one over thirteen anyhow--shakes you to pieces--speeds everything up to a blur-- you can see what happens when some flying Cub tries to go through this on muscle--splat!

question: What's your name? Where do you live, Mary? Why aren't you in Nursery? When do you go up?
answer: Not here. Might be a decoy. Runner!

question: Not here. Might be a decoy. Runner!
answer: Don't worry about her. We'll have that one later. Right now I think we've got a Runner and his pairup. And what a Runner!

question: I'm a Sandman!
answer: I cut up a Sandman yesterday. They said I'd never get him...but I cut him up good, I did. For me? Better feel sorry for your- self, Sandman!

question: No, for you! How old are you, Billy? Fourteen? Fifteen? Your days are running out. How long can you last? A year. Six months? What happens when you're sixteen and you go green? No cubs over fifteen, Billy! Ever heard of a cub with a green flower? You'll leave Cathedral then, Billy, when you're on green, because they won't let a green stay here. If you try to stay the young ones will gut-rip you apart!
answer: Shut up! Shut up your damn mouth! We can rush him...we can take can take him again, we can!!

question: Sanctuary? Anything? If they find you throw this hard enough to break it. Then hold your breath till you get away...It's blind gas.
answer: I'm ashamed. I was bringing you to be killed.

question: Where? Sanctuary? Can you take me there?
answer: Logan, I don't know where Sanctuary is. But if I take you to them, they'll kill you.

question: Then - why don't you leave me - go to them - explain
answer: No. Not that either.

question: It's a real privilege, Sandman.
answer: Thanks. I thought you'd be older. I ex- pected a Red. Your own work?

question: I designed it myself. What'll it be ...a face job or a full-body job?
answer: Just the face.

question: Follow me, Logan. Stay close.
answer: Are you taking me to them?

question: Yes. I don't know what else to do -- with him following us. Why do you keep running from your--
answer: Because he's my friend - and I don't want to be killed by him - or anyone.

question: He's good, isn't he?
answer: Will he find us and kill us? Yes...or one of the others. You know there's only one place to go now... I'd rather take my chances with them...than with Francis.

question: May we move?
answer: I saw we pass them through. Somebody help Holly. You two. Just go straight ahead. Follow the corridors with the pipes overhead to the end. Then use the key.

question: I don't know who you are. I'd like to thank someone.
answer: It doesn't matter who we are. Follow the tunnel to the end.

question: I Will there be someone to tell us where to go from there...?
answer: Someone will follow. When you come to the lock, he will tell you how Co go on the other side. Jessica may go with you as far as the lock.

question: Wait - I have the one I took from the Runner.
answer: There's no turning back, is there? How do we know this is the right way?

question: It's the only way.
answer: What do you suppose this was...?

question: Some kind of breeding pens...I suppose...They say people used to breed animal s, fish, anything To eat, of course.
answer: Ycch. To kill things and then eat them. It must have been a savage world. It's Francis, isn't it?

question: It's brighter there...besides, we can't go back.
answer: Wait.

question: It doesn't make any difference anymore.
answer: You're really one of us now, aren't you?

question: You knew that I wasn't before, didn't you? Why did you stay with me? I had to. I did kill...for the first time in my life I killed.
answer: Because you felt like a Runner, didn't you.

question: I guess so...I know I felt something I never felt before...and I didn't like it...not a bit. I'll tell you one thing...Sanctuary better be worth it. That's the last place for me to live now.
answer: For us.

question: Ah, but wait for the winds. Then my birds sing. My walrus breathes. My palace chimes and bells. And the deep grottoes whisper my name...Box Box...Bahhhhxxxxsss... Anything to eat?
answer: This place is a link to Sanctuary, isn't it?

question: You walked in. I saw you. Don't you remember? From? From? From?
answer: We were sent here and you know it. Others have been sent here. Where are they? Hiding? Where do we go?! Where do we go from here??!!

question: Is that the wind? Not yet... You must hear my birds sing.
answer: You know about Sanctuary! I know you do! You have to help us! You don't have a choice! It isn't your decision!! Tell us.

question: Never a pair. I have never had a pair.
answer: Where do you send them?

question: I've never seen humans whom I thought worthy of being here... I'd like to sculpt you. Where would I put you? I know...you'd be the base of the column. You'd hold up my world! Do you know how long all this will last? Not thirty years...or thirty thousand years...but thirty thousand thousand years...and you'll be part of it. Ages will roll...Ages. And you'll be here...the two of you... eternally frozen...frozen...beautiful.
answer: That's better. How do you want us?

question: Nude. Imagine, a pair. Up there.
answer: How do you want us?

question: Enchanting. Is that what humans do?
answer: All right. Now you keep your bargain.

question: Regular storage procedure...the same as the other food... The other food stopped coming and they started.
answer: What other food?

question: Fish and plankton, sea greens and protein from the sea. It's all here - ready - fresh as harvest day. Fish and plankton, sea greens and protein from the sea...And then it stopped coming and they came instead. So I store them here. I'm ready. And you're ready. It's my Job - protein, plankton, grass from the sea
answer: Tell us how to get out...or Ill destroy you..I'll kill you!

question: Tell us how to get out...or Ill destroy you..I'll kill you!
answer: Is there something on fire!!

question: It seems to be moving away. Come on... It feels like breath. It makes everything move. Your hair is moving. Jessica -- we must be outside!
answer: Don't!

question: Sooner or later, we'll have to try something They're good.
answer: It's getting dark and cold. I'm tired.

question: Why don't we rest here? We know we can eat these.
answer: Where do you think that heat-ball went? Do you think everything's going to turn to ice?

question: I doubt it.
answer: Don't ever let go.

question: I won't. It all seemed to make sense until Box.
answer: Do you think he was telling the Truth?

question: You're right...it must be near now. We'll find it.
answer: Logan!!!Look!! No...your palm...look!!!

question: Of course.
answer: Then the answer's Yes...

question: I have never seen a face like that before. It must be the look of great age. Whoever he was he was terribly old. They all have names and numbers on them. I wonder what they are?
answer: "Beloved Husband". "Beloved Wife". What can all that mean? Francis?

question: It wasn't always. I remember when it wasn't. But it wasn't your color either. ...or yours. I have my color somewhere.
answer: Those cracks in your face...do they hurt?

question: Oh, no...
answer: Could I touch them?

question: Oh, my...please try.
answer: What's your name?

question: Yes indeed, everyone. Actually, they all have three. "The naming of cats is a difficult matter. It isn't just one of your holiday games. You may think at first I'm mad as a hatter when I tell you a cat must have THREE DIFFERENT NAMES." An ordinary name and a fancy name. That's two. Do you want to guess what the third one is?
answer: How long have you been living here?

question: For as long as I can remember.
answer: What kind of place is this?

question: Just a place, I suppose...who knows?
answer: How did you get here?

question: I have always been here...
answer: Are there any other humans?

question: Gracious...no.
answer: Have any other people ever passed through?

question: But there may be a few around somewhere.
answer: What makes you think so?

question: My parents thought so. Mother and Father. You know?
answer: And...and how were you grown? Inside your mother?

question: Yes...
answer: Are you sure?

question: Here you can have this.
answer: What kind of jewel is this?

question: I don't know.
answer: You're both full of secrets like Macavity. Did you steal this?

question: No.
answer: "Macavity, Macavity, there's no one like Macavity, There never was a cat of such deceitfulness and suavity."

question: "Macavity, Macavity, there's no one like Macavity, There never was a cat of such deceitfulness and suavity."
answer: What's beyond this place - do you know?

question: No, no, no
answer: Did your Mother or Father ever mention another place?

question: Never, never, ever. Nothing.
answer: May we stay here for a while? We'd like to rest.

question: Of course you can stay. This belongs to the people.
answer: What belongs to the people?

question: All this. All of it.
answer: What people?

question: That sweet madman -- how could he Come to exist?
answer: He had a mother and father -- and he knew them.

question: One in a million, I suppose There's nothing to go on to, Jessica.
answer: There's a Sanctuary...there is!

question: That's the same fellow who's outside. If he was so important - why isn't he first?
answer: What did you do to him? Why? Why you? Do you know you ruined him? Do you know that? Can you tell me why? Why you? And now you've killed him, you know...

question: Look at your palm, Francis.... look! It's clear. Clear!
answer: Why did you do that??!!

question: I didn't do anything, Francis! They've made us believe that....
answer: Logan! You renewed!

question: We'll remember. But that's a long time off...
answer: What are we promising him? What can we possibly give him?

question: He asked if we would bury him when his time comes. To what?
answer: I'm going to try and tell people what we've seen and-- Do you expect me to let things go on without trying to change them?!

question: Things won't change...you know that! We can live here together, Logan... have a life as long as his... together! You want to go back to kill, is that it?! Now, you'll want to kill your own!!! kill Sandmen!!! Killing's all you ever...!!!! I want to be alive and with you, that's all I want.
answer: I know...I know... We're leaving.

question: Where are you going?
answer: To a city with thousands and thousands of people.

question: Alive? Thousands and thousands...as many as my cats?
answer: More...many more.

question: And all alive you say? Yes, I would like to see that. Is it a long journey?
answer: I promise. We '11 go on as soon as it's light.

question: That's better than gold when it's cold.
answer: Thank you. Tell me - what do those words mean? "Beloved husband...Beloved son"... "Beloved wife"'...

question: My father was the husband and my mother was the wife. "Beloved" is a word they used - to stay together.
answer: Stay? They lived together all their years?

question: And Sanctuary?
answer: Sanctuary is the right to live.... nothing more. But nothing less, either....

question: What does that water do?
answer: It's part of the hydrogalvanic system. The ocean tides are changed into energy somehow.

question: Is it inside the city?
answer: Of course. I don't know where... I Just took them for granted. It's our only chance. I'm sorry.
